EmailTemplate.description: Template para cuando se aprueba un TKD en cualquier stage.
EmailTemplate.name: TKD_Approval_Generic_Process_Template_Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" has been changed to {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} has been Approved and this record will changed to {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards, Engen Capital.
